title: ObsidianRelease
author: ObsidianRelease
content: WEBSITE   ||   DISCORD  ||  GITHUB   ||   EXPLORER   We have updated all of our logos and redesigned to be more simple and visually attractive including a new Ticker (OBN) .Latest Installer - https://github.com/ObsidianCoreCoin/obsidiancoin/releases/tag/v1.2.1.1We have also released our Whitepaper And RoadmapYou can read it here on our official publicized page||VISIT PAGE ||Obsidian Coin- name: Obsidian- ticker: OBN- type: PoW- maturity: 41- max supply: 168,000,000- p2p port: 2333- rpc port: 2332- halving: 840,000- block time: 72 seconds- diff time: 8,400 blocks- block reward: 100- pre-mine: 0- blocks: 28,560,000- days: 23,800- years: ~65.21- algo: SCRYPT
